description: Full planning application for a residential-led mixed use development ranging in height from 9 (ground plus 8 levels) to 24 storeys (ground plus 23 levels), containing 181 residential units (86 no. 1 bed units, 81 no. 2 bed units, 14 no. 3 bed units) with flexible commercial space at ground, first and second floor level, 8 no. disabled access car parking spaces, cycle parking, and associated amenity space, hard and soft landscaping
decision_conditions: Within 3 years date of the permission
Pre App Yes - Complied & no amendments
